fs.desc: You find yourself in a dimly lit terminal session. The prompt blinks patiently.

lab.desc: A cluttered research lab filled with blinking devices.

archive.desc: Dusty shelves of data backups line the walls.

core.desc: The core systems thrum with latent energy.

npc.desc: A quiet daemon lingers here, waiting to be addressed.

dream.desc: A hazy directory where reality blurs and ideas take shape.

subconscious.desc: Half-formed thoughts linger here, waiting to be read.

npc.desc: A soft presence waits to converse in this lucid space.

oracle.desc: An enigmatic chamber humming with distant voices.

memory.desc: Stacks of recollections archived for later reflection.

network.desc: Connections pulse faintly in this virtual mesh.

vault.desc: A locked vault storing plans best kept secret.

network_node.desc: A remote node secured behind layers of authentication.

deep_network_node.desc: An even more secure enclave hidden in the traffic.

node4.desc: The deepest node rumored to grant root access.

item_descriptions.access.key: A slim digital token rumored to unlock hidden directories.
item_descriptions.treasure.txt: A file filled with untold riches.
item_descriptions.mem.fragment: A corrupted memory fragment pulsing faintly with data.
item_descriptions.voice.log: An audio log that might contain a clue.
item_descriptions.decoder: A handheld device used to decode encrypted signals.
item_descriptions.old.note: A weathered note scribbled with barely readable commands.
item_descriptions.daemon.log: A log file chronicling the mutterings of a resident daemon.
item_descriptions.lucid.note: A scribbled note describing techniques for conscious dreaming.
item_descriptions.flashback.log: A recorded memory playback waiting to be relived.
item_descriptions.reverie.log: A log capturing fleeting reveries within the system.
item_descriptions.escape.plan: A hastily sketched route promising a way out.
item_descriptions.escape.code: A brief sequence hinting at a path to freedom.
item_descriptions.port.scanner: A handheld tool for probing network ports.
item_descriptions.node.log: Logs from a secure network node.
item_descriptions.auth.token: A multi-factor token used for deeper authentication.
item_descriptions.deep.node.log: Diagnostics from the heart of the network.
item_descriptions.firmware.patch: A subtle exploit enabling access to even deeper nodes.
item_descriptions.root.access: Credentials granting unrestricted control over the system.
